setup.rules:
Eleven matchsticks are arranged into the shape of a mountain with the snowy peak. It can be seen the shape contains one equilateral triangle - the big one. Below are three consecutive puzzles.
Puzzle 1. Can you move 1 matchstick to get two equilateral triangles?
Puzzle 2. Starting from the initial position again, can you move now 2 matchsticks to get three equilateral triangles? But note! The matchstick which you have been moving in Puzzle 1 must not be moved now.
